name: HMT_PPN_AT
description: This table contains information stored in the Health Maintenance Postpone audit trail.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the PATIENT table.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: HMT_PPN_TOPIC_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the health maintenance topic that is postponed.

columns.name: HMT_PPN_TOPIC_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the health maintenance topic.

columns.name: HMT_PPN_USR_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user that postponed a health maintenance topic.

columns.name: HMT_PPN_USR_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: HMT_PPN_DTTM
columns.description: The instant at which a health maintenance topic was postponed.

columns.name: HMT_PPN_UNTL_AT_DT
columns.description: The date until which a health maintenance topic is postponed.

columns.name: HMT_PPN_RSN_AT_C_NAME
columns.description: The postpone reason category number for the health maintenance topic which was postponed.

columns.name: HM_PPN_CMT_AT
columns.description: This item stores a free-text comment associated with a Health Maintenance postponement.
